alert.note: Alert for Piscataquis (Maine) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued May 22 at 1:44PM EDT until May 22 at 2:30PM EDT by NWS Caribou
info.description: The National Weather Service in Caribou Maine has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... West central Piscataquis County in north central Maine... * Until 230 PM EDT. * At 144 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Rockwood, or 15 miles northwest of Greenville, moving east at 25 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor hail damage to vehicles is possible. Expect wind damage to trees and power lines. * Locations impacted include... Kokadjo, Rockwood, Frenchtown, Beaver Cove, Spencer Bay, Mount Kineo and Lily Bay. TORNADO...POSSIBLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
